short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A gentle daily reminder to take attendance

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This free extension serves as your gentle reminder to take attendance! It's easy to get wrapped up in the happenings of the school day, and no one wants to get an email from the front office. Use this extension to remind yourself at a particular time to take attendance!
